summary: El Benny is deported from the U.S. and returns home to a Mexico devastated by the drug wars. He too joins in, and starts climbing the hierarchy, finding a prosperous life, full of money, women, violence and fun.
cast: Damián Alcázar|Joaquín Cosio|Ernesto Gómez Cruz|María Rojo|Elizabeth Cervantes|Daniel Giménez Cacho|Jorge Zárate|Salvador Sánchez|Angelina Peláez|Kristyan Ferrer|Dagoberto Gama|Mauricio Isaac|Alejandro Calva|Emilio Guerrero|Silverio Palacios|Mario Almada|Isela Vega|Daniel Martínez|Alfonso Figueroa|José Concepción Macías|José Sefami|Gerardo Taracena|Carlos Cobos|Noé Hernández|Zaide Silvia Gutiérrez|Tony Dalton|Héctor Jiménez|Gabino Rodríguez|Fermín Martínez|Ariel Galvan|Álex Perea|Hector Kotsifakis|Edwarda Gurrola|Andrés Márquez|Tenoch Huerta
title: El infierno
